name: UpdateReleaseNoteFreshservice
description:
Update a note on a release in Freshservice.

Use this tool to update an existing note on a specific release in Freshservice. It is useful when changes or corrections need to be made to release notes.

parameters.name: release_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the release associated with the note to be updated.

parameters.name: note_identifier
parameters.description: The unique ID of the note to be updated in Freshservice.

parameters.name: note_unique_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the note to be updated.

parameters.name: user_id_creator
parameters.description: Unique ID of the user who created the note to be updated.

value_schema.description: Unique ID of the user who created the note

parameters.name: notification_email_addresses
parameters.description: List of email addresses to notify about the note update.

value_schema.description: Addresses to which the note must be notified to

parameters.name: note_body_html
parameters.description: The body of the note in HTML format, containing the content to be updated.

value_schema.description: The body of the note in HTML format

parameters.name: note_body_plain_text
parameters.description: The body content of the note in plain text format, without HTML.

value_schema.description: The body of the note in plain text format

parameters.name: note_creation_datetime
parameters.description: The exact date and time when the note was originally created, in ISO 8601 format.

value_schema.description: Date time at which the note was created

parameters.name: note_updated_at
parameters.description: The date and time when the note was last updated in ISO 8601 format.

value_schema.description: Date time at which the note was updated

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the user who created the note

value_schema.description: Unique ID of the user who created the note

parameters.name: notify_emails
parameters.description: Addresses to which the note must be notified to

value_schema.description: Addresses to which the note must be notified to

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The body of the note in HTML format

value_schema.description: The body of the note in HTML format

parameters.name: body_text
parameters.description: The body of the note in plain text format

value_schema.description: The body of the note in plain text format

parameters.name: created_at
parameters.description: Date time at which the note was created

value_schema.description: Date time at which the note was created

parameters.name: updated_at
parameters.description: Date time at which the note was updated

value_schema.description: Date time at which the note was updated
